document_data.name: Dorhun
document_data.mainbody: '''Dorhun''' was a [[stone giant]] living in [[Gracklstugh]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Dorhun was one of the apprentices of Stonespeaker [[Hgraam]], leader of [[Clan Cairngorm]]. ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], his fellow apprentice [[Rihuud]] went mad and went on a rampage in the streets. Dorhun was tasked to take him back alive to their quarters.
